entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Dolbeau-Mistassini

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to drizzle and ending late this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
